channel.title: Replay on feroxbuster
channel.description: Recent content in Replay on feroxbuster

item.title: Replay Responses
item.description:
Replay Responses to a Proxy based on Status Code

Heads up

this means that for every response that matches your replay criteria, you’ll end up sending the request that generated that response a second time. Depending on the target and your engagement terms (if any), it may not make sense from a traffic generated perspective.

The --replay-proxy and --replay-codes options were added as a way to only send a select few responses to a proxy. This is in stark contrast to --proxy which proxies EVERY request.
